Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Preferred compounds which are useful in the present invention have an IC50 of 2 μM or less in the pSJTBPS binding assay described herein below.
One hundred microliter (ml) aliquots of the P2 homogenate (0.5 milligrams (mg) protein) were incubated with 2 nanomolar (nM) [35S]TBPS 
The tested compounds were dissolved in dimethylsulfoxide (Baker Chem. Co., Phillipsbury, NJ) and added to the incubation mixture in 5 μL aliquots.
